title: The Danube
creator_credit: D.C. Chipperfield, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Boulton-Hawker Films
brief_description: Follows the course of the Danube through Southern Central Europe from the Black Forest to the Black Sea. Depicts the farming activities of the peoples of the region and their cultural background, the variety of the landscape, the main towns, the traffic and the development of navigation and hydro-electric power along its course. Suitable for secondary level.
